item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module you can administer the guestbook.

item.name: notification_email_body_1
item.message: Someone has written a new guestbook entry on the website %1$s. Please click on the link below to review the entry (maybe it is necessary to login before): %2$s

item.name: notification_email_body_2
item.message: Someone has written a new guestbook entry on the website %1$s. Please click on the link below to review and activate the entry (maybe it is necessary to login before): %2$s

item.name: select_emoticons
item.message: Please select, wether you want to allow emoticons or not.

item.name: select_notification_type
item.message: Please select, wether you want to be notified about new guestbook entries or not.
